data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. September 01 2025 has approved the re-appointment of Mr. Anand Sureshbhai Desai as a Managing Director and Mrs. Mona Anandbhai Desai as a Whole-time Director of the Company for a period of 5 years commencing from April 01 2026 to March 31 2031 subject to approval of members at the ensuing 22nd Annual General Meeting of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. September 01 2025 has approved the appointment of M/s. M.D. Baid & Associates Practicing Company Secretaries Surat as Secretarial Auditor of the Company for a term of 5 consecutive years commencing from financial year 2025-26 to financial year 2029-30 subject to approval of members at the ensuing 22nd Annual General Meeting of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. September 01 2025 has inter alia approved the appointment of M/s. Natvarlal Vepari & Co. Chartered Accountants Surat in place of retiring statutory auditor viz. M/s. Rajendra & Co. Chartered Accountants Mumbai subject to approval of members at the ensuing 22nd Annual General Meeting of the Company.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Allotment
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on July 15 2025 have approved the allotment of 3914886 equity shares on preferential basis upon conversion of equal number of warrants.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Fixed Record Date For Interim Dividend As July 21 2025
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on July 15 2025 have approved the Record Date for payment of Interim Dividend for the financial year 2024-25 as July 21 2025.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on July 15 2025 have approved declaration of interim dividend for the financial year 2024-25 of INR 0.75/- per equity share i.e. @ 7.5% of face value of INR 10/- each and fixed Record Date as July 21 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for For Board Meeting Held On July 15 2025
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held on July 15 2025 have approved declaration of interim dividend for the financial year 2024-25 and fixed the Record Date and allotment of 3914886 equity shares upon conversion of warrants.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: Declaration of the payment of interim dividend for the financial year 2024-25 to the members of the Company and to fix the Record Date for this purpose.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Intimation for Declaration Of The Payment Of Interim Dividend For The Financial
Year 2024-25 And Allotment Of 3914886 Equity Shares On Preferential Basis Pursuant To Conversion Of Warrants
data.news_body: Anupam Rasayan India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 15/07/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the payment of Interim Dividend for the financial year 2024-25 to the members of the Company and to fix the Record Date for this purpose and to issue and allot 3914886 equity shares on preferential basis pursuant to conversion of equal number of warrants issued and allotted on January 23 2024 under preferential issue.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Director
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI Listing Regulations we would like to inform you that General Bikram Singh (Retd.) (DIN: 07259060) has resigned from the office of Non-Executive Independent Director of the Company with effect from close of business hours of Friday June 27 2025 due to personal reasons.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
In terms of Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held today i.e. May 12, 2022 have approved and taken on record the following items:

1. Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated) for the financial year ended March 31, 2022 together with the Independent Auditor's Report thereon.

2. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Approval Of Financial Results And Recommendation Of Final Dividend For The Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
In terms of Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held today i.e. May 12, 2022 have approved and taken on record the following items:

1. Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated) for the financial year ended March 31, 2022 together with the Independent Auditor's Report thereon.

2. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Held On February 11, 2022
data.news_body:
Approved
1. unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2021 and
2. Proposal to pass special resolution by way of postal ballot through remote e-voting only for continuation of directorship of Mr. Vijay Kumar Batra (DIN: 00038275) for the remainder of his tenure of two years completing on November 8, 2022, as a Non-Executive Independent Director of the Company, who will attain the age of 75 years on March 13, 2022, in order to comply with the requirements of Regulation 17 (1A) of SEBI Listing Regulations.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Approved Financial Result For Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2021 And Declared Interim Dividend
data.news_body:
Approved Unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021.
The Board has declared 1st interim dividend for the financial year 2021-22 of INR 0.50/- at 5% per equity share of face value of INR 10/- each to the equity shareholders.
Fixed Record Date for the payment of 1st interim dividend as November 18, 2021 and payment date on or before December 8, 2021.
